Location: U.S. data center expansions (Texas, Virginia, Oregon, Georgia)
Comments: Reuters reports CoreWeave expanded its infrastructure pact with OpenAI to $22.4 billion, with OpenAI also taking equity. Status: In progress.
Oracle and OpenAI partnering with G42 on a 1 GW facility beginning capacity rollout in 2026; financial terms not disclosed. Status: In progress.
Partnership ends Microsoft's exclusive status and adds Google TPUs to OpenAI workloads; financial terms undisclosed. Status: Announced.
Expanded multi-year Azure commitment to accelerate OpenAI deployments; widely reported multi-billion scale but not officially confirmed. Status: In progress.
Nscale and Aker each committing $1 billion to deliver 520 MW of capacity by early 2026. Status: In progress.

Location: Abilene Texas (expansions); Shackelford County, Texas; Dona Ana County, New Mexico; undisclosed Midwest location
Comments: WSJ reports a $300 billion multi-site expansion, with buildout likely starting in early 2027. Status: Announced.
Announced Sept 2025: 10 gigawatts corresponds to $400 billion ($40B per gigawatt); first phase targeted for H2 2026 using Vera Rubin platform. Status: Just announced.
SoftBank and SB Energy identifying new Stargate sites with 1.5 GW target; financial commitments not disclosed. Status: Just announced.
Announced Sept 2025: $10 billion order for custom AI chips; production beginning in 2026. Status: In progress.
Announced for H2 2026: 6 gigawatts of AMD MI450X GPUs (~2.78M chips) corresponding to $284 billion total capex; targets deployment alongside Rubin architecture. Status: Announced.
